Posts.Content: Hi I'm new to this group and had my first chemotherapy Friday 20 th and an op 4 wks previously..... it's taken me a week to feel a little normal .... been a little overwhelmed and agitated .... now that I feel a little normal I'm having sleepless nights... lying absolutely wide awake .... is this normal Thanks in advance x
Posts.Title: First chrmotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi Apologies for the late response have been trying to work out how to open the messages .... but thanks for your reply... once I work out how to use this it will be good to know I can have a chat  on here while in the wide awake club xx
Posts.Title: First chrmotherapy

Posts.Content: Thanksyou so much for your reply....and the warm welcome..... in future I will sleep during the day .... been trying to hold off.... and as you said ... mind full of everything ... planning in my head what scarf or hat to wear first.... and to next chemo...or my wig  Lol I've never had so much time on my hands .... but I will get used to it ..... and I'm thankful for this community .... everything in my life feels surreal now.... but I am happy to be alive  Xxxx
Posts.Title: First chrmotherapy
